Summary: bright huge orange light moving across the sky, changed direction flickered then dissapeard.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog then just looked up to see how huge the moon was and a bright orange light to the left of the moon caught my eye, it was roughly 3 to 4 times larger then a star moving across the sky at a fast speed then shifted to the north, flickered acouple times, then dissapeard. I asked my friend if he could hear a helicopter in that direction and he didnt hear anything.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Kitchener
There was one other sighting in Kitchener on or around May 5th 2012
